sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with non-square matrices
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations using matrix inverse method:

2x + 3y - z = 7

4x - 2y + 5z = -8

3x + 4y - 6z = 3
message_2:
To solve the system of linear equations using the matrix inverse method, we first need to write the given system in the matrix form AX = B, where A is the matrix of coefficients, X is the column matrix of variables, and B is the column matrix of constants.

The given system can be written as:

[ 2  3 -1] [x]   [ 7]
[ 4 -2  5] [y] = [-8]
[ 3  4 -6] [z]   [ 3]

Now, we need to find the inverse of matrix A, denoted as A^(-1). To do this, we first find the determinant of A:

det(A) = 2(-2*-6 - 5*4) - 3(4*-6 - 5*3) - (-1)(4*4 - 3*-2)
       = 2(12 - 20) - 3(-24 - 15) - (16 + 6)
       = 2(-8) + 3(9) - 22
       = -16 + 27 - 22
       = 11 - 22
       = -11

Since the determinant is non-zero, the inverse of A exists. Now, we find the adjoint of A and then divide each element by the determinant to get A^(-1):

adj(A) = [(-2*-6 - 5*4)  (4*-6 - 5*3)  (4*4 - 3*-2)]
         [(3*5 - 4*4)    (2*5 - 3*3)   (2*4 - 3*4)]
         [(3*-2 - 4*4)   (2*-2 - 3*3)  (2*3 - 3*2)]

adj(A) = [[12 - 20  -24 - 15  16 + 6]
          [-15 + 16  10 - 9   8 - 12]
          [6 - 16    4 - 9    6 - 6]]

adj(A) = [[-8  -39  22]
          [ 1   1  -4]
          [-10  5   0]]

Now, divide each element by the determinant (-11) to get A^(-1):

A^(-1) = 1/(-11) * [[-8  -39  22]
                    [ 1   1  -4]
                    [-10  5   0]]

A^(-1) = [[ 8/11  39/11 -22/11]
          [-1/11 -1/11  4/11]
          [10/11 -5/11  0]]

Now, we can find the solution X by multiplying A^(-1) with B:

X = A^(-1) * B

X = [[ 8/11  39/11 -22/11]   [ 7]
     [-1/11 -1/11  4/11] * [-8]
     [10/11 -5/11  0]]   [ 3]

X = [[(8/11)*7 + (39/11)*(-8) + (-22/11)*3]
     [(-1/11)*7 + (-1/11)*(-8) + (4/11)*3]
     [(10/11)*7 + (-5/11)*(-8) + 0*3]]

X = [[-8 + (-312/11) - (-66/11)]
     [-7/11 + 8/11 + 12/11]
     [70/11 + 40/11]]

X = [[-8 - (-246/11)]
     [13/11]
     [110/11]]

X = [[-8 + 246/11]
     [13/11]
     [10]]

X = [[22/11]
     [13/11]
     [10]]

So, the solution to the system of linear equations is x = 22/11, y = 13/11, and z = 10.
